PageInfo.Message:
By completing World Quests and Board Quests, you
can contribute to solving regional problems and
accumulate <COL ffdc78>Area Points.</COL>
When you reach a certain amount of Area Points,
the <COL ffdc78>Area Rank</COL> of the region
will increase.
<COL ffdc78>As the Area Rank increases,
changes such as the opening of blocked areas,
improvement of support goods, and the appearance
of new powerful enemies will occur.</COL>

The rank and current points of each area can be
checked in the <KC UI_GAME_MENU>game menu. You can
find them in the <COL ffdc78>"Area List"</COL> in
the "World" section.
Once you have accumulated enough points, visit
the Area Master and choose "Area Information".
This will increase your area rank.
Complete quests in various areas to increase your
area rank and expand your adventure.

<COL ffdc78>However, your Area Rank can only be
increased when you are the party leader. </COL>
In some cases, clearing Area Quests may be a
requirement.
Please note that if you are joining another
player's party as a guest, the leader's Area Rank
will be reflected.
